body:
Doesn't this value go out of scope right after this function?
Later when we get the value into TRT, it's pointing at garbage memory.

Why would we want to copy the memory out? TF owns the weights until the very end of the conversion, while TRT reads from and never writes to it during conversion. It seems safe.

body_text:
Doesn't this value go out of scope right after this function?
Later when we get the value into TRT, it's pointing at garbage memory.
Why would we want to copy the memory out? TF owns the weights until the very end of the conversion, while TRT reads from and never writes to it during conversion. It seems safe.
